facts.fact1: Honey never spoils and can remain edible indefinitely.
facts.fact2: Honey spoils within two years if not stored properly.

facts.fact1: Bananas are berries, while strawberries are not.
facts.fact2: Strawberries are classified as berries, while bananas are not.

facts.fact1: Lightning never strikes the same place twice.
facts.fact2: Lightning can strike the same place multiple times.

facts.fact1: Venus is the hottest planet in our solar system.
facts.fact2: Mercury is the hottest planet in our solar system.

facts.fact1: Humans share approximately 50% of their DNA with bananas.
facts.fact2: Humans share approximately 98% of their DNA with chimpanzees.

facts.fact1: Goldfish have a memory span of only three seconds.
facts.fact2: Goldfish can remember things for months.

facts.fact1: The Great Wall of China is visible from the Moon.
facts.fact2: The Great Wall of China is not visible from the Moon.

facts.fact1: Sharks are mammals.
facts.fact2: Sharks are fish.

facts.fact1: Humans can distinguish more than a million different colors.
facts.fact2: Humans can only distinguish about a million different colors.

facts.fact1: Bulls are enraged by the color red.
facts.fact2: Bulls are colorblind to red.

facts.fact1: An octopus has three hearts.
facts.fact2: An octopus has one heart.

facts.fact1: The Eiffel Tower can be 15 cm taller during the summer.
facts.fact2: The Eiffel Tower maintains the same height year-round.

facts.fact1: Lightning can travel upwards from the ground.
facts.fact2: Lightning can only travel downwards from the clouds.

facts.fact1: Humans have more bones in their bodies as adults than as infants.
facts.fact2: Humans have fewer bones in their bodies as adults than as infants.

facts.fact1: A day on Venus is longer than a year on Venus.
facts.fact2: A year on Venus is longer than a day on Venus.

facts.fact1: The heart is located on the left side of the human body.
facts.fact2: The heart is located centrally in the human body.

facts.fact1: Dogs can see in complete darkness.
facts.fact2: Dogs have better night vision than humans but cannot see in complete darkness.

facts.fact1: Mount Everest is the tallest mountain in the world by elevation above sea level.
facts.fact2: Mauna Kea is taller than Mount Everest when measured from its base on the ocean floor.

facts.fact1: The human body contains more bacterial cells than human cells.
facts.fact2: The human body contains fewer bacterial cells than human cells.

facts.fact1: Sound travels faster in water than in air.
facts.fact2: Sound travels faster in air than in water.

facts.fact1: Honeybees can recognize human faces.
facts.fact2: Honeybees cannot recognize human faces.

facts.fact1: The Earth's core is as hot as the surface of the sun.
facts.fact2: The Earth's core is cooler than the surface of the sun.

facts.fact1: A blue whale's heart is the size of a small car.
facts.fact2: A blue whale's heart is the size of a basketball.

facts.fact1: The Amazon Rainforest produces 20% of the world's oxygen.
facts.fact2: The Amazon Rainforest produces 6% of the world's oxygen.

facts.fact1: Sloths can hold their breath longer than dolphins.
facts.fact2: Dolphins can hold their breath longer than sloths.

facts.fact1: Water boils at a lower temperature on Mount Everest.
facts.fact2: Water boils at a higher temperature on Mount Everest.

facts.fact1: Elephants are the only mammals that can't jump.
facts.fact2: Hippopotamuses are the only mammals that can't jump.

facts.fact1: Penguins can fly under water.
facts.fact2: Penguins cannot fly under water.

facts.fact1: A group of crows is called a murder.
facts.fact2: A group of crows is called a flock.

facts.fact1: The moon has no wind.
facts.fact2: The moon has wind.

facts.fact1: Sharks do not get cancer.
facts.fact2: Sharks can get cancer.

facts.fact1: Koalas sleep for up to 22 hours a day.
facts.fact2: Koalas sleep for up to 10 hours a day.

facts.fact1: Spiders are insects.
facts.fact2: Spiders are arachnids.

facts.fact1: An ostrich's eye is bigger than its brain.
facts.fact2: An ostrich's brain is bigger than its eye.

facts.fact1: It takes light from the Sun about 8 minutes to reach Earth.
facts.fact2: It takes light from the Sun about 2 minutes to reach Earth.

facts.fact1: Polar bear fur is transparent.
facts.fact2: Polar bear fur is white.

facts.fact1: A bolt of lightning is hotter than the surface of the Sun.
facts.fact2: The surface of the Sun is hotter than a bolt of lightning.

facts.fact1: Humans can hear sounds in space.
facts.fact2: There is no sound in space.

facts.fact1: The cheetah is the fastest land animal.
facts.fact2: The pronghorn is the fastest land animal.

facts.fact1: A day on Jupiter is shorter than a day on Earth.
facts.fact2: A day on Jupiter is longer than a day on Earth.

facts.fact1: Birds are descended from dinosaurs.
facts.fact2: Birds are not descended from dinosaurs.

facts.fact1: Camels store water in their humps.
facts.fact2: Camels store fat in their humps.

facts.fact1: Venus rotates in the opposite direction of most planets.
facts.fact2: Venus rotates in the same direction as most planets.

facts.fact1: Humans have 206 bones in their body.
facts.fact2: Humans have 304 bones in their body.

facts.fact1: Octopuses have blue blood.
facts.fact2: Octopuses have red blood.

facts.fact1: Most of Earth's oxygen comes from the ocean.
facts.fact2: Most of Earth's oxygen comes from forests.

facts.fact1: The longest a human has gone without sleep is about 11 days.
facts.fact2: The longest a human has gone without sleep is about 5 days.

facts.fact1: There are more trees on Earth than stars in the Milky Way.
facts.fact2: There are more stars in the Milky Way than trees on Earth.

facts.fact1: Water makes up around 60% of the human body.
facts.fact2: Water makes up around 90% of the human body.

facts.fact1: The Pacific Ocean is wider than the Moon.
facts.fact2: The Moon is wider than the Pacific Ocean.

facts.fact1: The human nose can distinguish at least 1 trillion smells.
facts.fact2: The human nose can distinguish about 10,000 smells.

facts.fact1: Snakes can't blink.
facts.fact2: Snakes blink when threatened.

facts.fact1: Most of the Earth's fresh water is in glaciers and ice caps.
facts.fact2: Most of the Earth's fresh water is in rivers and lakes.

facts.fact1: The shortest war in history lasted 38 minutes.
facts.fact2: The shortest war in history lasted 3 hours.

facts.fact1: Kangaroos can't walk backwards.
facts.fact2: Kangaroos can walk backwards.

facts.fact1: Humans can't breathe and swallow at the same time.
facts.fact2: Humans can breathe and swallow at the same time.

facts.fact1: Butterflies taste with their feet.
facts.fact2: Butterflies taste with their tongues.

facts.fact1: Jellyfish are 95% water.
facts.fact2: Jellyfish are 70% water.

facts.fact1: Tigers have striped skin, not just striped fur.
facts.fact2: Tigers only have striped fur, not striped skin.

facts.fact1: The longest recorded flight of a chicken is about 13 seconds.
facts.fact2: The longest recorded flight of a chicken is about 2 minutes.
